page.title: Credentials
page.description: Securely store your passwords or credit cards here to link them throughout your workflows.

note.text: This feature requires a Bitwarden-compatible server (
note.suffix: or a paid Bitwarden account. Make sure the relevant `SKYVERN_AUTH_BITWARDEN_*` environment variables are configured. See details

success.title: Credential created
success.description: Your credential has been created successfully

errors.title: Error
errors.allFieldsRequired: All credit card fields are required

twoFactor.title: Two-Factor Authentication
twoFactor.description: Set up Skyvern to automatically retrieve two-factor authentication codes.
twoFactor.contactUs: Contact us to set up two-factor authentication in workflows
twoFactor.seeDocumentation: see our documentation on how to set up two-factor authentication in workflows
twoFactor.authenticatorHelp: You need to find the authenticator secret from the website where you are using the credential. Here are some guides from popular authenticator apps:

delete.title: Are you sure?
delete.message: The credential {{name}} will be PERMANENTLY deleted. The Skyvern team has no way to restore a credential once it's deleted.
